Articles.Content:
Hey everybody,

I looked up Huntsville on Google Earth and this is what I found. Has anyone been to there and has seen these things?
Decades ago, long before the S-V replica and the revamped visitor's center eliminated about half of the rocket garden's exhibits...

I was there a couple years ago, and there were the two upright replicas. I don't recall the Apollo mockup (bottom left), but it might just be my memory.

They've got a real Saturn V horizontally in the building, along with a capsule (that re-entered) and a bunch of other stuff.
Long time ago. If you are in the area, its definitely worth a look.

Long time ago. If you are in the area, its definitely worth a look.

I'll be there next year, really looking forward to it!
